磕碰.definition: to knock against; to bump into; to have a disagreement; to clash

磕磕絆絆.definition: bumpy (of a road); limping (of a person)

磕磣.definition: (dialect) ugly; unsightly; shabby; (dialect) to humiliate; to ridicule

磕糖.definition: (slang) to revel in the sight of one's favorite couple being affectionate; to lap it up when one sees a couple whom one ships kissing or cuddling

磕頭.definition: to kowtow (traditional greeting, esp. to a superior, involving kneeling and pressing one's forehead to the ground)

磕頭如搗蒜.definition: lit. to kowtow like grinding garlic (idiom); fig. to pound the ground with one's head
